com.i2group.apollo.commandservice.transport

Class CreateLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.commandservice.transport.Command
      • com.i2group.apollo.commandservice.transport.CreateLink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommand, IChangeSet<CardChangeSet,CardChangeSet>, IItemChangeSet, ISecurityPermissionChangeSet

    public final class CreateLink
extends Command
implements ICommand, IItemChangeSet, ISecurityPermissionChangeSet
    The ICommand for creating a Link between two Entitys.

    If the getSourceInfo method of any supplied CardChangeSet returns null, then the resulting Card is given an empty SourceInfo.

    Leasing:

    • After creation, an active lease exists on the Link.
    Authorization:
    • The supplied "from" and "to" entity identifiers must correspond to Entitys on which the current user has at least the SecurityAccessLevel.READ_CLOAKED access level.
    Validation:
    • The keys in the ItemIdentifiers must not exceed the maximum permitted length of 36 characters.
    • The item type identifier must correspond to a LinkType in the Schema.
    • The identified LinkType must not have ProhibitedCreate associated with it.
    • The supplied "from" and "to" entity identifiers must correspond to Entitys that satisfy the link end constraints of the LinkType.
    • The security for the Link must be specified by either:
      • Providing SecurityAccessPermissions and SecurityGrantPermissions, or
      • Providing the identifiers of SecurityTags
      The next sections contain detailed validation rules for these two approaches.
    • The CardChangeSets must contain no PropertyChanges or PropertyGroupChanges.
    • The CardChangeSets must contain no identifiers of Propertys or PropertyGroups for removal.
    • The CardChangeSets must contain no Propertys or PropertyGroups that have ProhibitedCreate associated with their types.
    • The specified linkStrengthId must correspond to a LinkStrength in the Schema.
    • See CardChangeSet, SecurityAccessPermission, and SecurityGrantPermission for more validation rules.
    Validation of SecurityAccessPermissions and SecurityGrantPermissions:
    • There must be at least one SecurityAccessPermission for each "access" SecurityDimension in the SecuritySchema.
    • There must be at least one SecurityGrantPermission for each "grant" SecurityDimension in the SecuritySchema.
    Validation of SecurityTags:
    • The same SecurityTag identifier must not occur twice.
    • The identified SecurityTags must satisfy the constraints specified in the SecuritySchema with regard to SecurityTagGroups.
    • The identified SecurityTags must evaluate to at least one SecurityAccessPermission for each "access" SecurityDimension in the SecuritySchema.
    • The identified SecurityTags must evaluate to at least one SecurityGrantPermission for each "grant" SecurityDimension in the SecuritySchema.
    • See SecurityTagGroup for more validation rules.
    Note: It is possible to create a Link that has a "from" or "to" entity identifier that corresponds to a deleted Entity.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateLink

        public CreateLink(ItemIdentifier itemIdentifier,
                  String itemTypeId,
                  ItemIdentifierAndOptionalVersion fromEntityIdentifier,
                  ItemIdentifierAndOptionalVersion toEntityIdentifier,
                  LinkDirection linkDirection,
                  String linkStrengthId,
                  Collection<CardChangeSet> newCards,
                  Collection<SecurityAccessPermission> accessPermissions,
                  Collection<SecurityGrantPermission> grantPermissions,
                  Collection<String> securityTagIds)
        Constructs a new CreateLink.
        Parameters:
        itemIdentifier - The ItemIdentifier of the Link to be created.
        itemTypeId - A String containing the identifier of the new Link's LinkType.
        fromEntityIdentifier - The ItemIdentifierAndOptionalVersion of the new Link's "from" Entity.

        Note: From version 4.0 of the API, the version in the ItemIdentifierAndOptionalVersion is ignored, and the latest version is used in all cases.

        toEntityIdentifier - The ItemIdentifierAndOptionalVersion of the new Link's "to" Entity.

        Note: From version 4.0 of the API, the version in the ItemIdentifierAndOptionalVersion is ignored, and the latest version is used in all cases.

        linkDirection - The LinkDirection of the new Link.
        linkStrengthId - A String containing the identifier of the LinkStrength for the new Link.
        newCards - CardChangeSets containing information for the new Link's Cards. There might be no CardChangeSets.
        accessPermissions - The SecurityAccessPermissions for the new Link.
        grantPermissions - The SecurityGrantPermissions for the new Entity.
        securityTagIds - Strings containing the identifiers of the SecurityTags for the new Link.
